snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Create Chat Bubbles using Constraints (Ep 13)
snippet.description:
Very exciting episode today as we'll be looking at how to create very crisp rounded bubbles for our text views.  To make this easy to follow, I'll be going through each step rather slowly. First rendering the background bubble view in our cells. Next we'll look at how to retrieve and estimation for the amount of spacing we need for our bubbles.  Along the way, we'll also fix a couple of bugs that currently in our app.  Enjoy guys.

Previous Episode 12:
https://youtu.be/azFjJZxZP6M

All episodes for Firebase 3 series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEfHqwjBV0XFb9qx9cGXwkq

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources on my channel:
